From: "Penny Heatherington" <pheatherington@...>

My company has started to use JUnit as a testing tool for our Java developm=
ent. We are considering making it an 'organizationally approved' tool for o=
ur development environment.  In order to accomplish this, we will perform a=
 technical evaluation of the tool and submit an 'to be approved' recommenda=
tion to our Standards Committee. A 'Support Plan' must accompany the reques=
t for approval.  Consequently, I am researching support that is available f=
or the tool.

Do you have any specific information regarding JUnit support?=
 Have any articles been written on the subject? Has a "Support Plan" been w=
ritten by one of Junit's users.

I have visited the SourceForge site as wel=
l as JUnit.org, so I am generally familiar with what is there.

Does anyone=
 provide telephone support?

Thank you for any information you can provide.=


Penny Heatherington
Project Lead
OppenheimerFunds
